scripts.test: cat test/input.js | NODE_ENV=test node ./src/cli.js > ./test/output.js && export DIFF="$(diff ./test/expected.js ./test/output.js)" && [ -z "$DIFF" ] || (echo "$DIFF" && exit 1)
